name: Dark Magic: An RPG Prototype
description:
Take control of a tiny knight as he battles against hordes of skeletons! Use all of the weapons at your disposal to fight back the undead army and defeat the necromancer. 

- Standard Mode: Dive into the tiny, handcrafted dungeon and defeat the boss!

- Horde Mode: Fight against a never-ending horde of enemies and test your mettle!

This is a prototype for a game I'm working on. Feel free to provide feedback on any of the systems you see here, especially regarding what you thought was fun (or not) and what you would want to see more of. I appreciate any comments!
